mapper.sql: id, categoryId, title, summary, content, sort, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, hits
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_volunteer_school ( categoryId, title, summary, content, sort, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, hits ) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{hits} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_volunteer_school
categoryId = #{categoryId},
title = #{title},
summary = #{summary},
content = #{content},
sort = #{sort},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
hits = #{hits},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_volunteer_school
categoryId = #{map.categoryId},
title = #{map.title},
summary = #{map.summary},
content = #{map.content},
sort = #{map.sort},
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
hits = #{map.hits},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_volunteer_school ( categoryId, title, summary, content, sort, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, hits ) VALUES ( #{map.categoryId}, #{map.title}, #{map.summary}, #{map.content}, #{map.sort}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.hits} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_volunteer_school
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND categoryId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.categoryId} , '%')
AND title like CONCAT('%', #{condition.title} , '%')
AND summary like CONCAT('%', #{condition.summary} , '%')
AND content like CONCAT('%', #{condition.content} , '%')
AND sort like CONCAT('%', #{condition.sort} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND hits like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hits} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
